text: The Order of Nishanizzuddeen is the highest honor given to foreign nationals by the Maldives government. They are seven recipients so far who has been awarded the honor. == List of recipients == *Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, 13 March 1972 *Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India. June 8,2019 ==References== Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of the Maldives
title: Order of Nishanizzuddeen
